_header: Saint John the good gospeller / Tells us as I said you here
Note: For the version in the ‘expanded’ Cycle see 6361.
_description: Gospel for the Twenty-first Sunday after Trinity in the Northern Homily Cycle

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
Seint Ion þe gude gospellereTelleþ þat I schal sei
                    ow here…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…þat may ȝe bi a tale hereþat falleþ wel
                    to vre matere
BodEngPoeta1.Attributed Title:
Erat quidam Regulus cuius filius infirm (f.
                    212rc)
BodEngPoeta1.Facsimiles:
Doyle,  I. A.,
                        ed.  
             The Vernon Manuscript. A Facsimile of Bodleian Library, Oxford, MS Eng.
                poet.a.1,
          with an introduction by A. I. Doyle. Cambridge: D. S. Brewer, 1987. 
Scase,  Wendy,  and  Nick Kennedy, eds.  
             A facsimile edition of the Vernon manuscript: Oxford, Bodleian Library, MS. Eng. Poet. A. 1.
         Oxford: The Bodleian Library, 2011.

CULAdd8335.First Lines:
SEynt Ione þe gode gospellereSais þus in oure godspelle
                    here…
CULAdd8335.Last Lines:
…þat may we se by a tale hereþat acordes til
                    þis matere
CULAdd8335.Attributed Title:
Dominica xxia post festum trinitatis secundum Iohannem (p.
                    334)

CULDd11.First Lines:
SEynt Iohn þe good gospellereSeyth þus in oure gospel
                    hereA town was callid caphasnaumto whilk crist was wont to
                    com…
CULDd11.Last Lines:
…& þat may we seen be a tale hereþat acordip to
                    þis matere
CULDd11.Attributed Title:
Dominica vicesima prima post festum sancte trinitatis. Euangelium
                        secundum Iohannem (f. 203)

CULGg531.First Lines:
Seynt Iohn þe gospelerTelles vs als I sayd ȝow
                    are…
CULGg531.Last Lines:
…Haf mercy on oure soules allAnd late vs neuer in syn
                    fall
CULGg531.Attributed Title:
dominica xxia post trinitatem Secundum Iohannem (f.
                        146v)

BLAdd22283.First Lines:
SEint Ion þe gospelereTelleþ þat I scal sei
                    owhere…
BLAdd22283.Last Lines:
…Þat may ȝe bi a tale hereÞat falleþ wel
                    to vre matere

MinULZ822.First Lines:
Saynte Ihon þe gud gospellereTelles þat I sall say
                    ȝow hereIn oure gospell of to day…
MinULZ822.Last Lines:
…þat may ȝe se be a tale hereþat falles wele
                    tyll oure matere
